name: Food Delivery App
desc: Food Delivery App is a cutting-edge ReactJS application for hassle-free food ordering. Browse menus, customize orders, and track deliveries in real-time. Enjoy secure payments, order history, and top-notch customer support. Say goodbye to waiting in lines and hello to delicious meals at your doorstep!

name: Quiz app
desc: Online Quiz Application is a user-friendly web-based platform for taking quizzes. Users can select quizzes, answer questions, and view their scores easily.

name: Weather Dekho
desc: A ReactJS weather app offering real-time weather information, including temperature, conditions, and forecasts, with a seamless user interface.

name: Stack OverFlow Clone
desc: Project is based on MERN Stack which is a web application that provides users a platform to ask, resolve and share their queries. Users can sign up and log in to their account, Ask questions and answer the queries of other users.
